title: What Drink to Order a Girl at the Bar - Follow the Liter
description:
Welcome to our newest show Follow the Liter, where we teach you how to make fancy drinks that will impress your friends. This week, the Paloma!

Get a cocktail named after you here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=gameovergreggy

Buy our shirts! http://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy

Follow us on Twitter!
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Erick - http://twitter.com/castrodisiac

Music by Tonedeff: https://twitter.com/tonedeff

transcript_chunks.text: I'm Nick Scarpino with me is Erick Castro. Erick, you are a master bartender; is that correct? Uh, that's what some people say, not my words. You know, back when you and I used to be uh, what we call single, uh, I used to frequent a lot of bars. One of my favorite things to do to break the ice with a girl was to offer her a drink. What is the best drink I can offer to buy a girl that might impress her? I recommend buying a girl a Paloma; a Paloma. What's a Paloma? It's got tequila, so you're letting her know you mean business. Wow, let's see: 3/4 oz lime juice, half oz simple syrup, 2 oz of some tasty tequila – o tequila, tequila as they say in Mexico, that's basically how you say that word. Then now that you got the tequila in there, we're going to turn this into an energy drink and put a quick pinch of protein powder salt in there; sea salt. Okay, got it. And honestly, see this drink's ready to go, but if you happen to have a bottle of grapefruit bitters around, I recommend doing a dash or two in there to give it a

"Salt in there, sea salt, okay got it. And honest, see this drink's ready to go. But but if you happen have a bottle of grapefruit bitters around, I recommend doing a dash or two in there to give it a little bit of added depth and complexity. Okay, I'm a complex guy, so complex drink right at my alley yes sir. We're going to ice up our glass, wow we ice up our tin put the shaker on top you know what to do here folks mhm that's how the pros do it ladies and gentlemen. Now this drink all chilled and shaken up pour it over ice, what a bad boy looking sexy and refreshing. We're going to little hit it with a little bit of grapefruit soda all right you can keep it authentic by getting the Mexican kind if you can oh that is Tim likes that Tim Gettys they'll suck all that down couple straws and for garnish drop the lime wheel in there fancy there you go folks a Paloma all right man give it a sit all right here we go here it is the Paloma that is tasty that is like a warm summer day"

and for garnish drop the lime wheel in there fancy there you go folks a Paloma all right man give it a sit all right here we go here it is the Paloma that is tasty that is like a warm summer day in Southern California right there just what I love perfect the bar scene thank you so much Erick if you guys at home want to try some of these awesome custom cocktails if you're in San Diego you can go to Erick's bar Polite Provisions or if you're on the east coast in New York you can go to The Boiler Maker another great bar which is fantastic uh also if you like this video make sure to like it leave a comment below and share it with some of your friends Erick you have a special offer for the audience at home if you'd like me to come up with a special cocktail tailor made specifically for you go to patreon.com kindafunny awesome Erick thank you again so much for joining us subscribe to Kinda Funny if you like this content if not I'm going to go take my shirt off cheers and happy mixing walking
